subject: p14851532
Findings: In comparison with study of, the patient has taken a much better inspiration. There is enlargement of the cardiac silhouette with evidence of pulmonary vascular congestion that is less prominent than on the previous study. Retrocardiac opacification is consistent with volume loss in the lower lobe and there is blunting of both costophrenic angles. No evidence of pneumothorax. No acute focal pneumonia is identified.
